t: Bernhardt Design's Eye for International Talent Keeps the Brand Fresh - ICFF
s: August 28, 2024 - Since 1980, Bernhardt Design has been a leader and innovator in the furniture design world. President Jerry Helling heads an extraordinary creative team that continues to define Bernhardt Design as one of the world's leading design companies with an unrivaled roster of talent.

Known for its elegant seating, casegoods, and conference solutions, Bernhardt creates stylish and functional pieces that elevate both corporate and hospitality spaces. ... Monday - Friday by Apt. Only ... Your one stop shop for like new, affordable name brands in office furniture.
